name: Spinach and Mushroom Breakfast Wrap
instructions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they start to brown.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Pour the eggs into the skillet with the mushrooms and spinach. Cook, stirring frequently, until the eggs are scrambled and cooked through.
Warm the whole grain wrap in a separate pan or microwave.
Place the scrambled eggs, vegetables, and shredded cheese onto the wrap.
Roll up the wrap tightly and serve.
description: A hearty and nutritious breakfast wrap loaded with protein from eggs and cheese, and packed with the goodness of spinach, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes. Perfect for a quick, satisfying start to your day.
additional_notes: Feel free to add some hot sauce or salsa for an extra kick of flavor. For a dairy-free option, skip the cheese or use a dairy-free alternative.
